title: Daily Review with Clay and Buck - Nov 15 2021
itunes:title: Daily Review with Clay and Buck - Nov 15 2021
description:
How the mainstream media is operating in a realm of lies and not distinguishing between fact and opinion. Dave Rubin, host of The Rubin Report, talks about how Biden is getting his just deserts with Kamala. Julio Rosas, Townhall senior writer who has been covering the Rittenhouse trial and was at the riots, discusses the blatantly false white supremacist narrative. Fauci says everyone needs boosters. And Buck slaps down the NYT hit piece on him while Clay reminds everyone why our audience is growing.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
